name: ellmers
description: Ellmers is a tool for building and running DAG pipelines of AI tasks.

scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:samples
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:core && bun run build:storage &&bun run build:ai && bun run build:provider
scripts.build:samples: bun run bun run build:cli && bun run build:web
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts packages/*/src/**/*\.map samples/*/node_modules samples/*/dist samples/*/src/**/*\.d\.ts samples/*/src/**/*\.map
scripts.watch:packages: concurrently --kill-others -c 'auto' -n core,storage,ai,provider 'cd packages/core && bun run watch' 'sleep 3 && cd packages/storage && bun run watch' 'sleep 3 && cd packages/ai && bun run watch' 'sleep 6 && cd packages/provider && bun run watch'
